ComicInfo.Summary: Tales of the Masque by Mark Badger continues as government agents and foreign terrorists are drawn into the Masque's world. Also in this issue of this 1987 Kirby Award Nominee--two brand new features!
ComicInfo.Title: Masque (Part 2); Roma (Chapter Five); Forgotten
